Mae'r t√Æm amaethyddol @StFagans_Museum wedi bod yn gweithio'n galed i sicrhau bod pethau dal yn rhedeg ar Fferm Llwyn-yr-eos tra bod yr Amgueddfa ar gau.

Dyma Reolwr y Fferm, Brian Davies, yn trafod y gwaith sydd wedi parhau trwy'r cyfnod yma #StoriArYSul
üêë üêÑ pic.twitter.com/owra7XFPgS

— Amgueddfa Cymru - National Museum Wales (@AmgueddfaCymru) July 19, 2020

ar gau - closed

tra bod - whilst

pethau - things

The '@StFagans_Museum' agricultural team have been working hard to ensure things are still running at the Llwyn-yr-eos Farm while the Museum is closed. Here is the Farm Manager, Brian Davies, discussing the work that has been continuing during this period.

"Ers i fi ddechrau astudio dieteteg dw i wedi cael mwy o hyder i wybod be sy‚Äôn well i‚Äôr corff. Dw i bendant yn teimlo‚Äôn well achos dw i‚Äôn gwybod bo fi‚Äôn gwneud rhywbeth sy‚Äôn helpu‚Äôr amgylchedd ac anifeiliaid.‚Äù #golwghttps://t.co/2TsmuAYgCx

— Cylchgrawn Golwg (@CylchgrawnGolwg) July 18, 2020

ers - since

hyder - confidence

amgylchedd - environment

Since I started studying dietetics I've had more confidence in knowing what is better for the body. I definitely feel better because I know that I'm doing something that is helping the environment and animals.

Ydych chi'n gweithio mewn ysgol? Gallwch nawr ddefnyddio'r cod 'YsgolionMeddwl' i gael 35% i ffwrdd o bris ein cardiau post, os ydych yn bwriadu defnyddio neu arddangos y cardiau yn eich dosbarth.

>>https://t.co/32w8XjVBkQ<<#IechydMeddwl #yagym @heleddowencouk pic.twitter.com/JeZW9TmpEP

— Meddwl (@gwefanmeddwl) July 15, 2020

i ffwrdd - off

bwriadu - intend

arddangos- display

Are you working in a school? You can now use the code 'YsgolionMeddwl' to get 35% off the price of our post cards, if you aim to use or display the cards in your class.

Jul 2020

Dyma lyfr newydd sbon gan Angharad Tomos. Stori amserol i'r cyfnod clo yw hi, am Rwdlan a Dewin Dwl yn cael gwersi adre yn lle mynd i'r ysgol, ond mae'r ddau ddireidus yn penderfynu cael hwyl yn lle cael gwersi gan Ceridwen! https://t.co/WwuPKkMbiS #yagym @YLolfa pic.twitter.com/IQij2lMgQr

— Siop Na-nog (@SiopNanog) July 16, 2020

newydd sbon - brand new

penderfynu - to decide

yn lle - instead of

Here is a brand new book by Angharad Tomos. A timely story for the lockdown, about Rwdlan and Dewin Dwl having lessons at home instead of going to school, but the mischievous two decide to have fun instead of having lessons with Ceridwen!
